ygData.subject: Re: New guild forming up on Bertoxx
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No it s not the name of the evil guild. It just happens to be an old email address from a Diablo/Hellfire Guild I used to run. Just never bothered to
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Blizzard" <blizzard15@...>
>
>I see your address is templarknights. Is that the name of your guild? >For
>the Templar Knights were holy warriors in the crusades, and I had >planned
>to use this name for an all-Paladin guild for obvious >reasons. I'm not
>sayin dont use the name cuz my guild never got off >the ground, and I play
>a wizard now, but im just interested if it's >the name for an evil guild.
>

No it's not the name of the evil guild. It just happens to be an old email
address from a Diablo/Hellfire Guild I used to run. Just never bothered to
change it - so I'm using it for my EQ guilds email address.
